name: Bitexco Financial Tower
address: Bitexco Financial Tower, 2 Hai Trieu, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: One of the highest skyscrapers in Vietnam with 68 floors in total
full_description: The Bitexco Financial Tower proudly stands among Vietnam's tallest skyscrapers, boasting a total impressive 68 floors. With its lotus-inspired design, it gives off a sense of determination and positive energy. Officially inaugurated in 2010, this architectural wonder has always been praised as one of Vietnam's finest achievements, captivating all who behold its aesthetic appearance.

name: Landmark 81
address: Landmark 81, 720A Dien Bien Phu, Vinhomes Central Park, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A Skyward Marvel in Vietnam and the World
full_description: Standing as an iconic symbol of soaring ambition, The Landmark 81 proudly claims the title of the tallest skyscraper in Vietnam and ranks 8th globally. Over the years, this architectural masterpiece has been awarded with numerous titles, including the noble awards for the best sky view, largest indoor ice skating rink, and excellent luxury offerings.

name: Ben Thanh Market
address: Ben Thanh Market, Le Loi Street, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: One of the earliest buildings in Vietnam and has been the icon of the city since then
full_description: Ben Thanh Market, an age-old treasure of Vietnam, has graced our city for centuries, becoming an unforgettable symbol of Saigon. It holds a special place in the hearts of locals and tourists, leaving an impression that lingers on through time.

name: Saigon Square
address: Saigon Square, 77-89 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A shopping paradise for those who love fashion
full_description: Saigon Square shopping centrey is a bustling marketplace that offers a wide range of goods, catering for the fashion needs of visitors. With its diverse selection of items, it has become a favorite destination for fashion lovers. The vibrant atmosphere and reasonable pricing make it a shopping paradise, where visitors can spend hours exploring and finding their perfect style

name: War Remnants Museum
address: War Remnants Museum, 28 Vo Van Tan, Ward 6, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A member of the International Network of Peace Museums and International Council of Museums
full_description: The War Remnants Museum in Ho Chi Minh City offers a sobering glimpse into the Vietnam War's devastating impact. It stores a collection of artifacts, photographs, and exhibits that remind the war's atrocities and the resilience of the Vietnamese people. A visit to this museum serves as a powerful reminder of the importance of pursuing peace and understanding

name: Central Post Office
address: Central Post Office, 125 Hai Ba Trung, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: An iconic French-inspired historical building in Saigon
full_description: The Central Post Office in Saigon boasts an iconic French-inspired design, standing as a sign of Vietnam's colonial past. This historical building showcases a stunning architecture that transport visitors back in time. Serving as a functional post office and a popular tourist attraction, it offers a glimpse into the city's rich heritage and beauty

name: Saigon Opera House
address: Saigon Opera House, 7 Cong Truong Lam Son, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: Immerse yourself in a classical atmosphere amidst the modernity of Saigon
full_description: The Saigon Opera House is a magnificent gem that embraces elegance and sophistication. Built in the late 19th century, it stands as a historic cultural landmark and hosts a myriad of captivating performances, from traditional Vietnamese opera to contemporary shows.

name: Walking Street
address: Walking Street, Nguyen Hue Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A famous walking route within the heart of the city
full_description: Nguyen Hue Walking Street is a vibrant and bustling pedestrian walking route. Lined with colorful flowers and modern sculptures, it offers a delightful ambiance for sightseeing and outdoor activities. This popular destination is a hub of cultural events, street performances, and other events, making it a must-visit spot for both locals and tourists. It never fails to mesmerize visitors with its lively atmosphere and captivating charm.

name: Saigon Notre-Dame Cathedral
address: Saigon Notre-Dame Cathedral, 01 Cong Xa Paris, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A noble symbol of Catholicism in Vietnam
full_description: The Saigon Notre-Dame Cathedral acts as a significant symbol of Catholicism in Vietnam. Possessing a stunning design and unique sculptures, it continues to be a spiritual sanctuary for believers and a excellent sight for all visitors in Ho Chi Minh City.

name: Bui Vien Street
address: Bui Vien Street, Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: Experience the vibrant nightlife of Saigon, a city that never sleeps
full_description: Bui Vien Walking Street is a vibrant and bustling nightlife destination. It is famous for its lively atmosphere, lined with bars and pubs that cater for both locals and tourists. Visitors can immerse themselves in the energetic ambiance and enjoy a wide variety of cuisines. This place offers an memorable experience for those seeking to explore the city's nightlife.

name: Dam Sen Water Park
address: Dam Sen Water Park, 3 Hoa Binh, Ward 3, District 11, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A famous water park in Ho Chi Minh City.
full_description: Dam Sen Water Park is a renowned oasis of excitement and leisure in Ho Chi Minh City. Delight in a variety of water-based activities, including water slides, lazy rivers, and refreshing pools. Perfect for families and friend groups, it guarantees a memorable experience for all.

nearby_activities.event_name: Ho Chi Minh City Children's Cultural House for Youth

name: Independence Palace
address: Independence Palace, 135 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
short_description: A symbol of peace and national unity
full_description: The Independence Palace has always been one of the most aesthetically mesmerizing historical relics in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Its design blends the modern influences of the Western world with the solemnity of the Eastern countries. Everyday, this palace attracts hundreds of visitors, and it holds a special significance as a must-visit destination for foreign heads of state.
